sources.name: DimDate
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DimDate

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DimDate = let AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sefdinenassufblobcontain.blob.core.windows.net/input/datedim-6506f8f25d26e398055394.csv"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]) in  PromotedHeaders;
shared WeatherMetrics = let AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sefdinenassufblobcontain.blob.core.windows.net/input/weathermetrics-6506f85ed6fa8029696523.csv"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(PromotedHeaders, {{"DateID", Int64.Type}, {"RegionID", Int64.Type}, {"AverageTemperature", Int64.Type}, {"Humidity", Int64.Type}, {"WindSpeed", Int64.Type}, {"Rainfall", Int64.Type}, {"SunshineHours", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Added index" = Table.AddIndexColumn(#"Changed column type", "Index", 1, 1, Int64.Type),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Added index", {"Index", "DateID", "RegionID", "AverageTemperature", "Humidity", "WindSpeed", "Rainfall", "SunshineHours"}) in  #"Reordered columns";
shared DimDateCLeaned = let Source = #"DimDate",
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"DateID", Int64.Type}, {"Date", type date}}),
  #"Inserted year" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changed column type", "Year", each Date.Year([Date]), type nullable number),
  #"Inserted month" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted year", "Month", each Date.Month([Date]), type nullable number),
  #"Inserted month name" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted month", "Month name", each Date.MonthName([Date]), type nullable text),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Inserted month name", {"Month name"}),
  #"Inserted quarter" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed columns", "Quarter", each Date.QuarterOfYear([Date]), type nullable number),
  #"Inserted week of year" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted quarter", "Week of year", each Date.WeekOfYear([Date]), type nullable number),
  #"Inserted day" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted week of year", "Day", each Date.Day([Date]), type nullable number) in #"Inserted day";
